properties.entry: SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, STATUS, GENRE_CODE, MOVIE_UPDATE FROM TB_MOVIE JOIN TB_GENRE ON (GENRE_CODE = GENRE_NO) ORDER BY MOVIE_UPDATE DESC
SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_RT, MOVIE_RATED, MOVIE_RELEASE, MOVIE_STORY, STATUS, GENRE_NAME, DIRECTOR_NO FROM TB_MOVIE JOIN TB_GENRE ON (GENRE_CODE = GENRE_NO) WHERE GENRE_NAME = ?
